Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric contains many small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393748) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393748)
